thread.title: THE BEST HOTEL
thread.title_full: THE BEST HOTEL - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Shelby465
title: THE BEST HOTEL
text: We just stayed at the Hilton Times Square again. Have visited NY several times and this is our home away from home. We love this hotel as it has the highest level of service. It is the best in Times Squarel! Location is just one of the many positive features. The hotel management is superb, the front desk is so welcoming and accommodating, and the maids and concierge are wonderful, too. And the rooms are beautiful with amazing views. Never disappoints and can't say enough about this hotel!
